column4: In trying to dist-upgrade to Gutsy ( because update-manager "can't calculate the upgrade" there are many packages that "will be held back", can anyone help me figure out why they are going to be held back? There isn't any reason not to use it for storing files

It's all a matter of preference anyway though :)
whats wrong with having an additional partition :) yea i dunno i just doesnt feel right u know :)
If you are using LVM nothing :) Otherwise you have to be sure you get the right size the first time :)
